result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul Aaron Patterson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Escape-Leaving the State [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "H" Felony], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.42(3)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul Aaron Patterson

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Paul Aaron Patterson
Current: 2827 Sixth Street, c/o Green County Jail, Monroe, WI 53566 United States  (Effective: 09-03-2015)
Prior: 2827 6th St, Green County Jail, Monroe, WI 53566 United States

Paul Aaron Patterson, defendant appeared in Court in person with counsel Jane Ellen Bucher. Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Defendant waived a PSI and a NGI. Defendant pleads no contest to Count #1. Plea Questionaire filed. Court advises defendant of rights. Factual basis found. Elements stated. Defendant advised of firearm restriction. Defendant advised of voting rights.

ADDRESS INFO for Paul Aaron Patterson
Current: 2827 6th St, Green County Jail, Monroe, WI 53566 United States  (Effective: 06-23-2015)
Prior: RUMS,

Paul Aaron Patterson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Jane Ellen Bucher. Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Defendant is waiving his preliminary hearing. Information is filed; same charges and same penalties. Defendant stands mute.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 10, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Paul Aaron Patterson
Current: RUMS,   (Effective: 06-10-2015)
Prior: 307 Loraina Drive, Freeport, IL 61032

Violation: Escape-leaving the State
Issuing Agency: GCSD
Conditions:   May not leave state of Wisconsin or Green County without permission of Court.

Paul Aaron Patterson, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Jane Ellen Bucher. Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney. Court advises defendant of rights. Court advises defendant of charges and penalties. Defendant given complaint.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Defendant advises the court that he is homeless right now, but if he gets out he may be able to stay with his sister who lives here in Monroe.
